\newcommand{\exTitle}[1]{
\begin{center}
\begin{huge}
\textbf{#1}
\end{huge}
\end{center}
}

\newcommand{\exSubtitle}[1]{
\noindent
\begin{large}
\textbf{#1}
\end{large}
}

\newcommand{\exPlot}[1]{
\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{./img/#1.eps} 
}

\newenvironment{exFooter}{\par\vspace*{\fill}}{\clearpage}
